mapper.select: SELECT outles.outles_id, outles.outles_name, outles.ins_id, -- outles.user_id, outles.address_id, outles.alias, outles.outles_land_line_phone, outles.outles_remark, outles.can_default, outles.create_time, outles.create_by, outles.update_time, outles.update_by, outles.del_flag, ins.ins_name, sys_user.nick_name, sys_user.phone, address.address_id, address.province, address.city, address.area, address.code, address.information_address FROM p10_outles outles LEFT JOIN p10_institution ins ON ins.ins_id = outles.ins_id LEFT JOIN sys_user ON sys_user.user_id = outles.user_id LEFT JOIN p10_address address ON address.user_id = outles_id and address.type = 3 WHERE outles.del_flag = '0' AND ins.del_flag = '0' AND sys_user.del_flag = '0' AND outles.ins_id = #{query.insId}

SELECT outles.outles_id, outles.outles_name, outles.ins_id, -- outles.user_id, outles.address_id, outles.alias, outles.outles_land_line_phone, outles.outles_remark, outles.can_default, outles.create_time, outles.create_by, outles.update_time, outles.update_by, outles.del_flag FROM p10_user_outles_staff_re UOSR LEFT JOIN p10_outles outles ON outles.outles_id = UOSR.outles_id WHERE outles.del_flag = '0' AND UOSR.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT outles.outles_id, outles.outles_name, outles.ins_id, -- outles.user_id, outles.alias, outles.outles_land_line_phone, outles.outles_remark, outles.can_default, outles.create_time, outles.create_by, outles.update_time, outles.update_by, outles.del_flag FROM p10_user_outles_staff_re UOSR LEFT JOIN p10_outles outles ON outles.outles_id = UOSR.outles_id WHERE outles.del_flag = '0' AND UOSR.staff_id = #{staffId}

SELECT outles.outles_id, outles.outles_name, outles.ins_id, -- outles.user_id, outles.address_id, outles.alias, outles.outles_land_line_phone, outles.outles_remark, outles.can_default, outles.create_time, outles.create_by, outles.update_time, outles.update_by, outles.del_flag FROM p10_outles outles
outles.del_flag = '0'
and outles.ins_id =#{insId}
and outles.outles_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{outlesName},'%')
SELECT o.outles_id FROM p10_outles o, p10_user_outles_staff_re sr WHERE o.outles_id = sr.outles_id AND o.del_flag = '0' and sr.staff_id IN (#{userInsId})
SELECT o.* FROM p10_outles o, p10_user_outles_staff_re sr WHERE o.outles_id = sr.outles_id AND o.del_flag = '0' and sr.staff_id IN (#{userInsId})

select * from p10_outles left join p10_address on p10_address.user_id = p10_outles.outles_id and p10_address.type = 3 left join p10_institution ON p10_institution.ins_id = p10_outles.ins_id where p10_outles.del_flag = 0
and p10_outles.ins_id = #{insId}
and p10_outles.outles_name like concat('%', #{query.outlesName}, '%')
ORDER BY p10_outles.create_time DESC
select * from p10_outles left join p10_address on p10_address.user_id = p10_outles.outles_id and p10_address.type = 3 where p10_outles.del_flag = 0 and p10_outles.outles_id = #{outlesId} limit 1
